Package com.flag4j.linalg.solvers

Class LUSolver<T extends MatrixBase<?>,​U extends VectorBase<?>,​V extends VectorBase<?>>

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.linalg.solvers.LUSolver<T,​U,​V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
LinearSolver<T,​U,​V>
Direct Known Subclasses:
MatrixLUSolver
public abstract class LUSolver<T extends MatrixBase<?>,​U extends VectorBase<?>,​V extends VectorBase<?>> extends Object implements LinearSolver<T,​U,​V>

Solves a well determined system of equations Ax=b in an exact sense by using a LU decomposition.

If the system is not well determined, i.e. A is square and full rank, then use a least-squares solver.
